## Knowledge (remember and understand)

- Characterize the (max,+) algebra as a set: what are its elements?
- Define the two key operations of (max,+) algebra. Do it both for scalars and for matrices.
- Write down a general  (max,+) linear (also MPL) discrete-event system.

## Skills (use the knowledge to solve a problem)

- Formulate a simple queueing problem as an optimal control problem for an MPL system.
- Solve a simple optimal control problem for an MPL system.
